comments.body: We should probably annotate this (throughout the PR) with the bug number to make it easier to find and remove places we've done this later.
Sure. Added a TODO referencing flutter/flutter#31366, but left the link to the shell Wiki too.
Do these tests run on web? If so, we need the kIsWeb check to not break web, I believe.

For the most part, these are "manual" tests, so they don't run unless we run them manually. There are a couple (`card_collection` and `color_testing_demo`) that are run as part of the smoke tests that I've now reverted so that they don't run on desktop (or web).
